video.title: The Mafia Dolls
video.synopsis: This dramatic telenovela follows the tumultuous lives of the women who fall in -- and out of -- love with Colombia's biggest drug traffickers.

episodes.synopsis: After her father spends her college fund, Brenda is forced to look for work to pay for school; meanwhile, Braulio kills daughter Guadalupe's fiancé.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Gregorio shows Braulio his invention for hiding cocaine inside shoes, Braulio gives Lucrecia the divorce papers and Brenda sets fire to the drug lab.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Brenda questions Nicanor about the fire caused by the cocaine, but he denies it; Brenda's father is arrested for drug trafficking.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Norman kidnaps Lucrecia to scare her, but she offers him an interesting job; Brenda does business with Braulio to bail her father out of jail.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Brenda is blamed for kidnapping Lucrecia; Norman offers the person in charge of the ATM footage a bribe to destroy evidence; the DEA arrests El Capi.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Braulio wants to show off Brenda and Olivia at the the parade, Israel reappears to harass Renata; El Capi's plane full of cocaine disappears.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Duber and Erick swear to Gregorio that Giovanni has no mafia connections; Olivia confesses to Brenda that she liked being with Braulio.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Olivia sneaks out of the house to have dinner with drug kingpin Braulio; Norman receives an ominous note making reference to his crime.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Olivia tells Brenda she wants to go to Cartagena with Braulio and his friends; Pamela makes plans to turn Braulio in to the DEA.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Giovanni and Violeta are arrested while with Duber and Renata; Norman arrives in Cartagena, but is surprised to discover his wife there as well.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Braulio wakes up and is shocked by the sight of Olivia completely naked and lying next to him; Giovanni makes a fatal mistake with Duber.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Leonel has a harsh punishment in mind for Renata; Violeta asks Giovanni not to work with Norman; Braulio lavishes gifts and cash on Olivia.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Braulio discovers who ordered the attempted hit on Norman; meanwhile, Gregorio begs Norman to let Giovanni go, but Norman has other plans.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Braulio forces Lucrecia and Norman to resolve their issues, Olivia's father has her followed to Braulio's house, and Brenda and Nicolás get involved.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Pamela confesses to Violeta she wants to have Erick killed; Leonel is excited to work with Norman, unaware of the trouble it will cause him.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Braulio wants Brenda to accompany him to Miami and help him find Olivia; Pamela gets intimate with Asdrúbal to protect herself from Erick.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Erick becomes jealous when he finds out Pamela is with Asdrúbal; Braulio throws a party when his U.S. visa is approved; Violeta confronts Giovanni.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Braulio appoints Leonel as the organization's official accountant; the first 100 kilos of product are delivered; Erick threatens Pamela again.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Brenda tells her parents she has a nanny job in the U.S., but in reality travels with Braulio to Miami; photos surface of Giovanni with Violeta.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Alerted that Braulio is in the U.S. the DEA's manhunt begins by questioning El Capi; Brenda falls overboard; and Nicolás leaves a bar with Guadalupe.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Olivia waits for Brenda to arrive in Miami; Belén confronts Giovanni about being a drug trafficker; and Braulio has a big question for Olivia.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Brenda and her friends use Braulio's hideout for an all-night party; and Giovanni makes a promise to earn money by doubling his taxi-driving hours.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Braulio's attorney announces that the arrest warrant is lifted, but that an insider is providing the DEA with information; Braulio suspects Brenda.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Braulio and Brenda become intimate. Renata tells her husband she knows all about his affair with his new brothel partner, Melisa.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Leonel questions Elmer to see if Renata put a hit out on Melisa; Braulio begins to suspect Olivia; and Braulio's rival Nicanor offers Pamela a job.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Brenda tells Nicolás to take care of Guadalupe; and Renata will do anything to avoid Leonel's murderous rage -- including stealing his money.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Brenda's romance with Braulio continues; Karina faces off with Norman's wife, Noelia, about Violeta; and Braulio steps in to save Renata's life.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Nicanor proposes that if Pamela's father turns Braulio in to the DEA, he'll protect her family. Violeta reflects on her relationship with Giovanni.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: A furious Braulio heads to Nicanor's for Brenda, only to come face-to-face with his rival; and Violeta confesses to her mother that Norman raped her.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Violeta discovers her parents closed the store. Asdrúbal, Norman and Braulio plan to use a submarine to transport drugs past authorities.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Olivia tells Braulio she's ready to get married; Brenda is distraught over falling in love with her best friend's man; and the DEA threatens El Capi.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Braulio's partners arrive to inspect the submarine; and Giovanni follows Norman, takes photos of the meeting and tells the DEA about the submarine.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Pamela finds out Alejandro is married and is kicked out of Nicanor's home when she causes a scene; and Olivia confronts Brenda about Braulio.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Claudio and Lucho fight over Renata going to Colombia; Lucho is arrested at the airport; and Marlon blames Renata for the lost three million dollars.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Norman argues with Braulio that they should continue to ship the "merchandise" even though 15,000 kilos were confiscated from the submarine.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Disguised as an executive, Renata carries the drugs to Miami; Olivia tells Brenda she's the winner for marrying her ex-lover but that Braulio is a loser.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Renata's Miami contact counts the cash, warning if anything happens to the money, she'll suffer consequences; and Nicanor apologizes to Lucrecia.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Braulio visits Lucrecia but ends up in a confrontation with Nicanor, who puts a hit out on Brenda; meanwhile in Miami, police show up at Renata's.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Braulio and Brenda head for the hideout; Gregorio warns Norman not to hurt Giovanni; and Braulio and Nicanor come to an understanding.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Renata tries to reconcile with her parents; Brenda is weary of hiding out and wants to return home; and El Capi lures Norman into a DEA trap.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Brenda arrives at her parents' place; Violeta seeks revenge on Norman; Erick forces Renata to act as a drug mule; the police close in on Braulio.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Braulio and Olivia are arrested; Nicanor helps Lucrecia and Guadalupe hide; Violeta confronts Giovanni for allowing Norman to go free.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Violeta tells her mother she never wants to see Giovanni again; Brenda tells Olivia that Braulio had Gregorio killed; Erick threatens Renata's life.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Brenda turns to Asdrúbal for help, but he refuses; Olivia visits Braulio in prison; Claudio arrives at Pamela's and shoots Sultán, killing him.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: The DEA asks Brenda to collaborate with them in exchange for protection for her family; Erick follows Pamela to find Claudio, Sultán's killer.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Brenda tells Braulio that the DEA wants her to hand over information on him; Brenda and Olivia fight over Braulio.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Pamela contacts Asdrúbal so she can turn him in to the authorities; Norman demands that Leonel account for the money he's managing.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Nicanor torches Norman's estate; Pamela leads the cops to Asdrúbal; Erick sells Renata to a brothel to recover some of the lost $3 million.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: A depressed Renata is forced to sleep with any man who requests her; Braulio begins building his prison empire; Erick tails Braulio's lawyer.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Norman leads Olivia to believe he's available to help her, but he has ulterior motives; Lucrecia tells Nicanor that Guadalupe is at the estate.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Violeta wants to reconcile with Giovanni; Asdrúbal is nearly caught; Renata hopes she isn't one of the girls chosen to work in other countries.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Norman returns the stolen cash to Olivia; Asdrúbal suspects Pamela of bugging the casino's ladies' room and gives orders to have her killed.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Pamela begs for her life; Giovanni blames Brenda for their involvement in drug trafficking; Norman plots to keep the cartel war going.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Braulio threatens Nicanor over Guadalupe's kidnapping, then finds out Norman is responsible; Olivia's parents are worried she might go to prison.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Norman meets Olivia at the motel to return the stolen cash, unaware she's heavily armed; Pamela goes crazy when she learns her mother is dead.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Erick attends Pamela's mother's funeral but is pursued by González; Olivia uncovers shocking information about her marriage to Braulio.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Braulio admits to Brenda that his marriage to Olivia was faked; Renata swallows the drug packets to take into the U.S. but suffers a tragic fate.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Terrified of going to prison, Olivia asks her parents for help; Braulio has a prison guard's wife kidnapped, forcing the man to help him escape.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Lucrecia promotes her new mafia book in Paraguay. In Colombia, Brenda receives a romantic proposal but still thinks about Braulio. Olivia is liberated.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Brenda is shaken by Braulio's call on her wedding day. Raúl Jiménez asks Janeth to produce his life story. Orlando helps Olivia search for her father.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: A furious Lucrecia seeks revenge. Brenda's trip to the U.S. hits obstacles. Esteban urges Janeth to leave Julio. Martha looks for the missing money.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Janeth fears the worst when Julio goes missing. Lucrecia wants to return to the drug business. Olivia's depression overwhelms her. Braulio is attacked.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Martha's personal life disrupts Raúl's case. Olivia confronts the man who's been following her. Braulio and Brenda reunite. Lucrecia gets to know Ciro.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: The violence against Lucrecia continues. Brenda returns to her family and Orlando. Janeth is questioned about Julio. Raúl threatens a prosecutor.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Ciro pays Brenda a menacing visit. Lucrecia seeks help. A heartbroken and drunk Orlando makes a move on Olivia. Martha's children are bullied.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Orlando warns Ciro to leave Brenda and Renata alone. Against Olivia's wishes, Ramón blackmails a dangerous man. Martha's mother-in-law moves in.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Martha is threatened. Janeth goes public with her relationship. Brenda is followed when she tries to leave town. Lucrecia enters the drug business.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Olivia sends Orlando criminal evidence against his boss. Janeth is shocked by the judge's decision. Martha's family is terrified. Renata goes missing.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Brenda and Renata get into a terrible accident. Janeth receives help in jail. Lucrecia surprises Ciro. A destitute Olivia reunites with a friend.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Lucrecia plans to start coaching. Martha takes a stand against Raúl. Orlando's scheme is revealed. Janeth bonds with her fellow inmates.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Raúl has Janeth visit one of his cocaine laboratories. Olivia hatches a plan to get her money back. Lucrecia meets coaching guru Silvia Montana.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Martha realizes Raúl will always find her. Lucrecia misses her daughter. Irma is suspicious of Brenda. Olivia's job prospects lead her to a decision.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Raúl and Janeth get married in jail. Silvia sues Lucrecia. A prosecutor approaches Martha with incriminating photographs and an offer.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Braulio's return leads to serious consequences. Raúl's former sister-in-law warns Janeth not to trust him. Olivia mourns her loss.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Lucrecia makes a bold and deadly move. Olivia is attacked. Brenda receives tragic news. Janeth starts asking dangerous questions about her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Braulio surprises Lucrecia. Brenda gets a disturbing call. Gloria asks Olivia what happened to Edgar. Janeth's visit with Raúl takes a shocking turn.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Feeling betrayed, Janeth speaks out about Raúl. Lucrecia asks Danilo to work for her, but Braulio has other plans. Ciro suspects Brenda is alive.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Ciro seeks revenge against Martha. Lucrecia agrees to work with Braulio. As Orlando and Brenda plan their new life, they get troubling news from home.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Brenda gets injured when she's discovered at Alexandra's restaurant. Jhonny makes a gutsy move. Raúl tries to make Janeth's life miserable in jail.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Edgar unexpectedly helps Olivia. Martha seeks a lawyer for her husband. Lucrecia gets an offer to go on television, but Braulio is against the idea.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Edgar discovers Bairon and Liliana's relationship. An injured Brenda worries about her family. Janeth faces a tough decision. Jhonny's trial begins.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Raúl tells Janeth he doesn't want more children. Lucrecia's foundation gets caught in the drug raid Olivia orchestrated. Tito Urrea offers his help.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Lucrecia has a revealing interview with Janeth. A fight involving Olivia ends in an alarming way. Brenda mourns yet another devastating loss.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Olivia, Gloria and Edgar are torn over what to do with William. Raúl visits Janeth. Unbeknown to Martha, Jhonny and Tito make a plan.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Braulio contacts Brenda despite Lucrecia's warnings that it could be a trap. Liliana is ordered to seduce Ciro. Gloria is racked with guilt.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Braulio kidnaps Brenda after her betrayal. Janeth attempts to attack Raúl, with awful consequences. Mantilla visits Olivia's hair salon.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Lucrecia tells Braulio their partnership has ended. Janeth is terrified of what Raúl might do next. Martha decides to take on Ciro.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Lucrecia contemplates how to react to Janeth's secret message. Brenda asks Braulio to trust her once again. Liliana confesses her identity to Ciro.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Braulio doubts Orlando's plan. Edgar tells Olivia to trust Lucrecia. Janeth is tormented by memories of Esteban. Martha acquires evidence.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Ciro visits Olivia at the hospital and places blame on Lucrecia. Meanwhile, Martha blackmails Ciro. Braulio deviates from Orlando's plan.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Guadalupe surprises Lucrecia. Janeth gets a clue to Esteban's location and reminisces about their friendship. Martha meets with Raúl.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: After his arguments with Braulio and Brenda, Orlando turns to Olivia for comfort. Lucrecia says she wants out of the drug business. Janeth is rejected.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Guadalupe opens up to Lucrecia. Esteban and Janeth worry about his surgery. The DEA goes after Braulio. Orlando and Olivia get closer.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Brenda catches Olivia and Orlando off guard. Janeth auditions for a new role. Raúl keeps demanding more from Martha.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Raúl follows through on his promise to Braulio. Guadalupe turns to Ciro with an offer. Brenda shares news with Orlando. Esteban comes out of surgery.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Martha faces a difficult decision. Liliana's family worries about her. Braulio sends Brenda plane tickets. Esteban begs Janeth for help.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Brenda suspects something is happening between Olivia and Orlando. Janeth testifies at Raúl's trial. Edgar causes trouble with his jealousy.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Esteban demands answers from Janeth. After talking to Orlando about their relationship, Brenda is hospitalized. Ciro confronts Lucrecia about Nacho.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Lucrecia tells Asdrúbal about the business. Brenda decides to leave the hospital. Janeth asks Ciro for help. Orlando gives evidence against Braulio.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Brenda decides to go live with Olivia. Guadalupe confronts Ciro, asking him to tell her the truth about Lucrecia's involvement in Nacho's death.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: The DDA questions Braulio about Asdrúbal. Raúl tells Janeth about Ciro's betrayal and asks for a favor. Ciro says he's innocent in the attack on Raúl.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Guadalupe looks for evidence against her mother. Brenda decides to leave the country. The reporter who helped Orlando is dead.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Lucrecia looks for Martha, so she can get help talking to Braulio. Orlando is missing. Olivia is harassed. Janeth welcomes Raúl to her house.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Olivia tells Brenda about her plan to reveal who is behind Liliana's death. Braulio tells Raúl that Orlando's body has disappeared.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Braulio hides at Lucrecia's house. Janeth earns Raúl's trust and monitors him closely. Martha prepares to bury her two children.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Brenda reunites with Raúl and wants to contact Braulio. Janeth tries to earn Peto's trust. Ciro's men surprise Guadalupe and Lucrecia.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Jhonny decides to look for evidence against the Jiménez. After Janeth complains, Raúl relents and keeps Peto. The police are on Braulio's trail.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Olivia earns Yuly's trust. Jhonny fights to move forward with his investigation. Raúl gets rid of evidence from the attack the night before.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Brenda learns that Braulio is safe. El Coronel, Yuly's father, looks for the people behind what happened to his daughter. Raúl gives Janeth a gun.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Ciro tells Guadalupe that her parents have forgotten her. Janeth visits Esteban in Miami. Olivia gets a surprise after following Asdrúbal's orders.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Brenda tries to help Braulio flee. Raúl tells Janeth that, from now on, she will be his voice and his eyes. Olivia has a new task.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: El Coronel and Asdrúbal send drugs to Olivia's house. Janeth affects Raúl's health. Braulio contacts Brenda. Ciro gives Lucrecia an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Janeth causes Armero to be suspicious. Memo confronts Brenda. Guadalupe is abandoned. Braulio has a severe fever because of his wounds.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Memo leads an operation to capture Braulio. El Coronel asks Olivia to talk to someone special. Janeth tries to defeat Raúl's partners.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Braulio locates Ciro. Esteban tells Janeth that they've found Armero's body. Ciro tells Lucrecia that if she helps, he'll tell her where Guadalupe is.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Olivia gives El Coronel a chance. Janeth has Raúl cornered. Martha decides to take justice into her own hands and kill Ciro. Brenda is on the lam.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Brenda changes her looks and fakes her identity. The exchange between Ciro and Guadalupe is underway. El Coronel realizes Olivia has betrayed him.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Brenda learns about Janeth's death and Raúl decides to turn himself in. With Olivia's help, Memo captures El Coronel. Janeth is ambushed.
episodes.title: Episode 60
